name: Shapes on a Plane - Blueprints by @MountVitruvius

metadata.name: Shapes on a Plane - Blueprint #1
metadata.description:
A short-form generative series exploring isometric shapes stacked on a plane. This is one of a limited run of 16 unique plottable outputs, all made using the same generative codebase.

This NFT features the original generated SVG that was used for the physical plot, and can be used to re-plot the piece again.
